pullRequest.title: 6107 prompt user to use CR only in release mode

commit.message: 6107 prompt user to use CR only in release mode

nodes.bodyText: I  notice that this call to reportUpgradeError is conditional on RuntimeProperties.runningWithGUI, which it should be. However, the call to reportUpgradeError on line 143 is not conditional in this way. Maybe it would be better to put a  RuntimeProperties.runningWithGUI conditional in reportUpgradeError.
